bibl.title: Gin Kato v. Henry M. White. Warrants of Arrest
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: Alien prostitutes in Restricted District, Ketchikan, Alaska, May 15, 1920
House #1. BELLE BROWN: Age 30; born in Belgium; landed in New York 18 years ago, destined to brother, Jake Brown, Cleveland, O. never married; subject of Belgium.
House #3. ROSE BURKE: Russian Jewess; born in Russia, came to U.S. 13 years ago; never married.

House #9. NINAMILLER, alias PEGGY MILLER; Age 26; subject of Italy; born in Rome, Italy; reared in London; came from England on Jan. 10, 1912, on ss "Royal Edward" under name Nina Miller; landing at Halifax; remained in Canada until 1915 when she entered U.S. via CPR steamer from Vancouver to Seattle.

House #11. ADELINE BERGER, correct name MARGHERITA TARABOLO, subject of Italy; claims first came to U.S. in 1911; last entry March 25, 1919, via New York as "La Tourraine" under name of Margherita Tarabolo.
Aliens employed in Houses of Prostitution, Ketchikan, Alaska, 5-15-1920.
House #21. SAM GUEM: employed as cook; Chinaman; born in China; first came to U.S. during registration period for Chinese; returned to China for a year's visit about 1915.

House #31. CHUNG HIM; employed as cook; Chinaman; born in China; claims in US 26 years and that certificate of residence is in Portland; made trip to China 4 years ago. Has worked in this house of prostitution last 2 1/2 months.
House #7A SEID YAM: employed as cook; age 57; claims certificate of residence is in Portland; made trip to China 9 years ago.
House #9-B GIN KATO; Japanese; employed as cook; claims in US 40 years; never returned to Japan.
